name: Golduck
flavorText:
Often seen swim­
ming elegantly by
lake shores. It is often mistaken
for the Japanese
monster, Kappa.

previous.name: Psyduck
previous.flavorText:
While lulling its
enemies with its
vacant look, this wily POKéMON will
use psychokinetic
powers.

next.name: Mankey
next.flavorText:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.
